text: Two Days of Miracles () is a 1970 Soviet fantasy comedy movie directed by Lev Mirsky.ДВА ДНЯ ЧУДЕС (1970)ДВА ДНЯ ЧУДЕС It stars Leonid Kuravlyov, Borya Mayhrovsky, and Mikhail Kozakov. ==Actors== *Leonid Kuravlyov - Vadim Murashev *Borya Mayhrovsky - Grisha Murashev *Mikhail Kozakov - professor-examiner of the Institute of Good Wizards *Elena Mozgovaya - fairy Violet *Natalia Markina - fairy Daisy == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1970 fantasy movies Category:1970 comedy movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: Two Days of Miracles
